choices.answer: Do not gossip.
Be yourself, no matter what other people think.
Tell the truth.
Do not vandalize.

questions.question: What is the moral of The Lion King?

choices.answer: Keep your promises.
Do not cheat.
Do not run from the past.
Don't trust strangers.

questions.question: What is the moral of Peter Pan?

choices.answer: Embrace your inner child, no matter how old you are.
Treat others as you would want to be treated.
Do not judge
Keep your promises
Respect others
Listen to your heart
Have integrity
Have patience

questions.question: What is the moral of Finding Nemo?

choices.answer: Be loyal
Be generous
Don't bite the hand that feeds you
A litter determination goes a long way

questions.question: What is the moral of Beauty and the Beast?

choices.answer: Don't make much ado about nothing
We should always own up to our actions
True beauty is in how one treats others
Be honest, even if it's disappoints someone.
What makes you different is also what makes you special
All of our actions affects the world around us
People can only trust you if you do what you promise
It is up to each of us to care for the world around us
Be thankful in our lives every day.
Step outside your comfort zone
Think about things you are grateful for can make you happier
Donâ€™t dwell on the bad things in life
